name: TO BE DIRE
description:
Your safe zone is only going to last so long.

Get out there and see the horrors that you have to deal with.

Gather resources and get back as soon as possible.

They can smell your fear all the way to you.

Survive. It's the only thing you can do.

How to play:
  • WASD: Move the character
  • SPACE: Interact with resources
  • ESC: Quit the game
